channel.title: Lewis Carroll on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Lewis Carroll on jverkamp.com

item.title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
item.description:
How puzzling all these changes are! I’m never sure what I’m going to be, from one minute to another.

Well that’s a weird book.

I’m sure I’ve read it before and I know I’ve at least seen the Disney version, but apparently I haven’t reviewed it, so here we go.

That’s a weird book.

Good though.
